item.title: Kylie Minogue - I Should Be So Lucky
item.description:
In my
imagination
There is
no complication
I dream about you
all the time
In my mind
a celebration
The sweetest
of sensation
Thinking
you could be mine
In my
imagination
There is
no hesitation
We walk together
hand in hand
I’m
dreaming
You fell in love
with me
Like I’m in love
with you
But dreaming’s all
I do
If only they’d
come true
I should be so lucky
lucky lucky lucky
I should be so lucky
in love

To give you
